defined-type.description: Which category the mission belongs to, "Location" for missions that appear in the world.

defined-subtype.description: The sub-category of the mission, like a world title, if applicable.

ui-sort-order.description: The order in which the mission appears in the UI.

offer-object-id.description: The object that offers this mission, like an NPC. Should be -1 for achivements.

target-object-id.description: The object that accepts this mission when complete, like an NPC. Should be -1 for achivements.

reward-currency.description: The amount of currency rewarded by the mission.

lego-score.description: The amount of experience rewarded by the mission.

reward-reputation.description: The amount of reputation rewarded by the mission.

is-choice-reward.description: Whether the reward is a choice of items or whether the items are given automatically.

id.description: An item rewarded by the mission.

count.description: The amount of the item rewarded by the mission.

reward-items.description: The items rewarded by the mission.

reward-emotes.description: The emotes rewarded by the mission.

reward-maximagination.description: The amount of imagination capacity rewarded by the mission.

reward-maxhealth.description: The amount of health capacity rewarded by the mission.

reward-maxinventory.description: The amount of inventory space rewarded by the mission.

reward-maxmodel.description: The amount of models space rewarded by the mission.

reward-maxwidget.description: The amount of widgets space rewarded by the mission.

reward-maxwallet.description: The amount of currency space rewarded by the mission.

repeatable.description: Whether the mission can be repeated.

reward-currency-repeatable.description: The amount of currency rewarded by the mission when repeated.

id.description: An item rewarded by the mission when repeated.

count.description: The amount of the item rewarded by the mission when repeated.

reward-items-repeatable.description: The items rewarded by the mission when repeated.

time-limit.description: The time limit for the mission.

is-mission.description: Whether the object is a mission (true) or an achievement (false).

mission-icon-id.description: The icon to display for the mission in the UI.

turn-in-icon.description: The icon to display with the tooltip for the mission when it is ready to turn in.

prerequisites.description: The missions that must be completed before this mission is available.

in-motd.description: Whether the mission is in the mission of the day pool.

cooldown-time.description: The time before the mission can be repeated.

is-random.description: Whether the mission is randomly selected from a pool.

random-pool.description: The pool of missions from which the mission is randomly selected.

reward-bankinventory.description: The amount of bank inventory space rewarded by the mission.

tasks.description: The tasks that must be completed to finish the mission.

accepted.description: The cinematic that plays when the mission is accepted.

completed.description: The cinematic that plays when the mission is completed.

repeatable.description: The cinematic that plays when the mission is repeated.

repeatable-complete.description: The cinematic that plays when the mission is repeated and completed.

cinematics.description: The cinematics that play when the mission changes states.

accept-chat-bubble.description: The chat bubble text that appears when the mission is accepted.

chat-state-available.description: The chat bubble text that appears when the mission is available.

chat-state-active.description: The chat bubble text that appears when the mission is active.

chat-state-ready-to-complete.description: The chat bubble text that appears when the mission is ready to complete.

chat-state-complete.description: The chat bubble text that appears when the mission is complete.

completion-success-tooltip.description: The tooltip that appears when the mission is completed and ready to turn in.

in-progress.description: The text that appears in the talk UI when the mission is in progress.

offer.description: The text that appears in the talk UI when the mission is offered.

ready-to-complete.description: The text that appears in the talk UI when the mission is ready to complete.
